title: Can adenovirus be removed from a vaccine by using antibiotics or homeopathy?
description: Answer: Why would you want to neutralize a vaccine against adenovirus? There are no live viral particles in the influenza vaccine. This may not agree with what you have "heard" via social media, but it's true. You can look this up yourself. The website of the National Institutes of Health has th...
